contest-event.event-date:
May 17, 1969 D Grand Shield British Open Spring Festival (Grand Shield) 10 Test Piece Contest British Open Spring Festival grand-shield Winners back to 1952 are as engraved on the current Grand Shield trophy. Except for 1981 to 1984 where the bands on the trophy appear to have come second, not first! Was a different trophy given to the winners? If you know the answer please let us know.

There are also results on the trophy from 1902 to 1938, but they are for the Crystal Palace Contest (see link at top of page). Peddars Way Belle Vue (Kings Hall), Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK May 1, 2010, 5:04 p.m. Aug. 28, 2015, 2:24 p.m. 1 Thoresby Colliery William Lippeatt 2 Rockingham Band Edmund Hoole 3 Desford Colliery Band Bernard Springett 4 Slaithwaite Band Derek Broadbent 5 1st Old Boys Association Band (Belfast) Alfie Burch 6 BMP (Europe) Goodshaw Band Herbert H. Howarth 7 Brodsworth Colliery Band Ken Johnson 8 Dawdon Lodge Stan MacDonald 9 Newham Band Cyril Suckling 10 55th Old Boys Association Silver Band Jack Burch 11 Vernon Building Society (Poynton) Brass Band G. T. Shawcross 12 Stretford Band E. R. Harris 13 Walkden Band E. Vint Withdrawn Dove Holes Band H. Hill
